question: Who married Sarah Hugill in 1972, had two children, divorced in 1983, married Sarah Brightman in 1984, divorced in 1990, married Madeleine Gurdon in 1991, and had three children?
vanilla_rag_result: The individual you are referring to is Andrew Lloyd Webber. He married Sarah Hugill in 1972, had two children with her, divorced in 1983, married Sarah Brightman in 1984, divorced in 1990, and then married Madeleine Gurdon in 1991, with whom he had three children.
